records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about collection of soil sample for soil testing?
records.KccAns: recommended for  Aside from DIB hole clean from top to bottom 2 cm Thick clay clean bucket or tray and put in the bottom to take out. collected the soil by hand, mix thoroughly and put on clean clothes pile , make a goal . Different finger to remove dirt from the pile of four equal parts . Now the remaining two parts of the soil again to mix well and set goals . This process is then repeated until almost half forts Top soil remains . The representative samples.

records.QueryText: Information regarding how to control weeds in transplanted  paddy nursery?
records.KccAns: Apply 1200 ml. Butachlor 50EC or 600 ml. Rifit 50EC or 60 ml. Sathi 10WP or 45 gm. Topstar 80WP may be mixed with 60 kg. of sand/acre and broadcast uniformly in 4-5 cm deep standing water 2-3 days after transplanting.

records.QueryText: Asked about sesame foliar nutrition management
records.KccAns: recommended for 2 kg DAP / 10 litre of water soaked and dissolved overnight and after that filter the supernatant solution and add water to make up to 100 litre of water and spray 1 acre
